issue_name: Multiple Vulnerabilities in Fortigate NGFW before V7.4.3 on RUGGEDCOM APE1808 devices

1.description: Contact customer support to receive patch and update information.

2.command: Set a non form-based authentication scheme
2.description: For CVE-2023-42789 and CVE-2023-42790, set a non form-based authentication scheme. See https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-23-328 for details.

3.description: For CVE-2024-21762, disable SSL VPN. Note that disabling webmode is NOT a valid workaround. See https://www.fortiguard.com/psirt/FG-IR-24-015 for details.

4.command: Remove fgfm access for each interface
4.description: For CVE-2024-23113, remove the fgfm access for each interface. See https://www.fortiguard.com/psirt/FG-IR-24-029 for details.
